description: When making a request to an API, a syntax error occurs when attempting to format the request body with an incorrect data type. The code attempts to format the request body as an integer, but the API requires a string. As a result, the request fails and a compile/runtime error is
code:
#import necessary libraries
import requests
import json

#set up request body
data = {
    'name': 'John Doe',
    'age': 25
}

#encode request body as json
data = json.dumps(data)
